text: he eemaan vaalo! allaah ke aage sachchee[1] tauba karo. sambhav hai ki tumhaara paalanahaar door kar de tumhaaree buraeeyaan tumase tatha pravesh kara de tumhen aise svargon mein, bahatee hain jinamen naharen. jis din vah apamaanit nahin karega nabee ko aur na unhen, jo eemaan laaye hain unake saath. unaka prakaash[2] daud raha hoga, unake aage tatha unake daayen, ve praarthana kar rahe hongeh he hamaare paalanahaar! poorn kar de hamaare lie hamaara prakaash tatha kshama kar de hamen. vaastav mein, too jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
